page.title: 19A DAY IN MY LIFE (SHEFFIELD)
page.content:
Hello, my name is{Jamie}and I am 9 years old. On Friday, when I get to school, I have a game of marbles. Then the whistle goes and when I am in the classroom we finish off some S.M.P. (mathswork).
Then it is time for craft and this week we made pots. It is brilliant. It is all sticky and gooey. I made a pot with a lot of patterns, it was good. At home time (3.35p.m.),I am happy.
At 7 p.m. it is{Boys' Brigade.}First it is parade, then we buy some sweets, then we have a game. We play football, then write, knit or sew.
At 9 o'clock I go to my Nanan's to sleep. We have a beer and a shandy, then go to bed.
